CustomField.description: Full contractor address for use on agreements, letters, pizza deliveries, etc.
CustomField.formula: Contractor__r.BillingStreet + BR() + Contractor__r.BillingCity + ", "+ Contractor__r.BillingState +" " + Contractor__r.BillingPostalCode + BR() + Contractor__r.BillingCountry
CustomField.label: Contractor Address
